DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study ass analgesic property oral dose V117957 4.5 mg aqueous suspension third molar extraction model
DOC.brief_title: An Analgesic Study V117957 Treatment Postsurgical Pain Due Third Molar Extraction
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include : Males age 18 45 year ; Females age 18 45 year nonchildbearing potential ; A body mass index 18 30.0 kg/m2 , inclusive ; Scheduled undergo outpatient surgical extraction 2 third molar ( least 1 partial bony mandibular extraction ) ; Experience moderate severe pain ; Use topical benzocaine , 2 % lidocaine epinephrine , nitrous oxide preoperative medication ; Are deem investigator appropriate candidate protocolspecified therapeutic regimen . Exclusion Criteria include : Are female pregnant , lactate childbearing potential , positive pregnancy test result screen checkin ; A history current condition might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion ; A history frequent nausea emesis regardless etiology ; A history seizure head trauma sequela ; A cardiovascular disorder , include hypertension , unstable atrial fibrillation , symptomatic bradycardia , unstable congestive heart failure active myocardial ischemia ; A history alcohol substance abuse addiction ; A history opioid abuse addiction ; A positive urine drug alcohol test screening checkin ; A positive urine cotinine test result screen checkin , smoke frequently ( > 1 time per week ) use tobacco nicotine substitute within 1 month load dose study drug , and/or inability refrain use nicotine checkin followup visit ; Ingest xanthine caffeinecontaining food beverage ( eg , coffee , tea , chocolate , cola ) within 24 hour load dose study drug duration confinement clinical site ; Have presence history ( within 2 year screen ) bleed disorder ( ) peptic ulcer disease ; Have donate lose â‰¥ 500 mL blood 60 day screen ; Use medication , standard dental surgery ; Have use acetaminophen , ibuprofen , aspirin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug analgesic ( OTC prescription ) within 3 day surgery ; use longacting anesthetic ( eg , bupivacaine ) medication may result prolonged anesthesia , analgesia , sedation ; Have presence chronic acute painful condition , study indication , could interfere assessment efficacy study drug condition , opinion investigator , would adversely affect subject 's ability complete study measure ; Are unsuitable participate study reason , opinion investigator .
